Should mention that TraceConfig is used for tracing events in aiohttp client, allowing users to attach callbacks to various request lifecycle events, such as request start, end, exception, connection events, DNS resolution, redirects, chunk sent/received, etc. The property on_response_chunk_received returns a Signal that can be used to register callbacks that receive TraceResponseChunkReceivedParams when a response chunk is received. The inputs are the callbacks; the output is the Signal object. The business logic is to provide a tracing configuration for aiohttp client requests.
